    public interface ISimulation
    The ISimulation is an interface for a simulation, containing boxes, species, a random number generator and an integrator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBox(IBox newBox)
      Adds a Box to the simulation.
      void addSpecies(ISpecies species)
      Adds species to the list of all ISpecies in the simulation, and adds notifies all IBoxes of the new ISpecies.
      IBox getBox(int index)
      Returns Box specified by index contained in the Simulation
      int getBoxCount()
      Returns number of boxes contained in the Simulation
      ISimulationEventManager getEventManager()
      Returns the Simulation's event manager, which fires events for Boxes and Species being added and removed.
      IIntegrator getIntegrator()
      Returns the integrator for this simulation.
      IRandom getRandom()
      Returns the Simulation's random number generator.
      ISpecies getSpecies(int index)
      Returns the Species in the Simulation for the specified index.
      int getSpeciesCount()
      Returns the number of Species in the Simulation.
      void removeBox(IBox oldBox)
      Removes a Box to the simulation.
      void removeSpecies(ISpecies removedSpecies)
      Removes the given ISpecies from the ISimulation.

    • Method Detail

      • addBox

        void addBox(IBox newBox)
        Adds a Box to the simulation. This method should not be called if newBox is already held by the simulation.

      • removeBox

        void removeBox(IBox oldBox)
        Removes a Box to the simulation. This method should not be called if oldBox is not held by the simulation.

      • getBoxCount

        int getBoxCount()
        Returns number of boxes contained in the Simulation

      • getBox

        IBox getBox(int index)
        Returns Box specified by index contained in the Simulation

      • addSpecies

        void addSpecies(ISpecies species)
        Adds species to the list of all ISpecies in the simulation, and adds notifies all IBoxes of the new ISpecies.

      • removeSpecies

        void removeSpecies(ISpecies removedSpecies)
        Removes the given ISpecies from the ISimulation.

      • getSpeciesCount

        int getSpeciesCount()
        Returns the number of Species in the Simulation.

      • getSpecies

        ISpecies getSpecies(int index)
        Returns the Species in the Simulation for the specified index.

      • getIntegrator

        IIntegrator getIntegrator()
        Returns the integrator for this simulation.

      • getRandom

        IRandom getRandom()
        Returns the Simulation's random number generator.

      • getEventManager

        ISimulationEventManager getEventManager()
        Returns the Simulation's event manager, which fires events for Boxes and Species being added and removed.
